timeline.bodyText: I would inline these, they are used in single place.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText:
5m is too little and env up should have the same timeout (currently env up has 10m and this has 5m).
but, Idk why we need a startup timeout now, that we didn't before. Did you experience startup freeze?
how often does it happen?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: 5 min is enough for every environment that we use. I agree that test run and env up should have the same timeout. I'll open followup PR
replies.author: wendigo

replies.bodyText:
it's not, if you factor in image downloads.
especially that this can be run on GHA, but also locally.
10 or even 15m would feel much safer
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
in fact, i'd rather not have a timeout on individual attempt, until this is proven necessary.
i don't remember seeing a startup hang
replies.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText:
5m is very generous. What backoff is supposed to help with?
Supposedly we're the only player in the system.
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: This backoff is only to put some delay between retries. As delay doubles on every retry it won't reach 5 minutes in default configuration.
replies.author: wendigo

timeline.bodyText: Please add a code comment why we want to do so.
timeline.author: findepi
